## Rose plot 

### Using ggplot2 package

```{r}
d <- data.frame(Angle = 0:35*10, Rate = abs(rnorm(36)))

ggplot(d, aes(x = Angle, y = Rate)) +
  coord_polar(theta = "x", start = -pi/36) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 360, 30))
```
